import { useSuseEffect } from 'react'; import Form from 'react-form-ease'; import Field from 'react-form-ease'; import iconoCerrar from "./IconoCerrar.png"; import styles from "./Modal.module.css"; function Modal({ video, categorias, onSave, onClose }) { const valoresIniciales = { titulo: video.titulo, categoria: video.categoria, imagen: video.capa, videoURL: video.videoURL, descripcion: video.descripcion || '', }; const salvandoDatos = (values) => { onSave({ ...video, ...values, }); }; return (

Editar Video

) } export default Modal
